I am blessed to have the best job I can imagine.  I have the privilege of working with a fantastic staff and wonderful Chamber members in a community where everyone has a focus on growing a successful business climate.
I was responsible for building relationships in the community, chamber membership and corporate partnerships for the Chamber.
Create, implement and maintain all monthly programs and annual events for our members and community.
Coordinate marketing activities for our clinics, staff and community.

My first job!  Thank you, Randy Johnson, for giving the high school girl from Centralia a chance!  What a great learning experience.  I loved my time with Apple and met so many fantastic people through my work there
I was able to learn more about Mesa and the inner workings of Mesa Police Department.

Sally is a star performer. If you're looking for someone who makes a serious impact and gets things accomplished, look no further. Sally is the go to person for CEOs, Mayors, Senators, etc. for a reason. She's personable, smart and humble, with an uncanny hard work ethic and as much altruism as one could ever hope for in a leader. Her soft skills are easily seen in her expansive network and ability to connect with people from all walks of life. Furthermore, her ability to stay on top of all her responsibilities while growing herself, her company, and the community is nothing short of down-right impressive.

Sally must have some sort of Star Trek transporter device in her possession - she is on the spot at every event, function, ceremony to represent The Chamber and spread the word of the benefits of membership. She is a strategist of the highest level, always looking for new ways to incorporate The Chamber with new businesses, while at the same time maintaining constant contact with current members. Marketing and promotion of The Chamber is first class and she is the ideal choice to lead The Chamber in Arizona's fastest growing metropolitan area - Mesa....a nice place - a.

The result has been a great collection of images that not only promote the associations events but also many of its members.

Sally has an amazing ability to manage many different events/projects at the same, while growing them-not just putting the event on.  She has been able to maintain a high volunteer base which is due to her fantastic personality, as well as being detail oriented while seeing the big picture, and she follows through and double checks everything.  I would not be a volunteer on a few of her committees if she did not have the enthusiasm to make each event/program a success as well as her “get it done and done right” attitude.  Sally is truly a big asset to the Mesa Chamber.

July 21, 2016, Sally was a client of Ben’s

I have had the pleasure of working with Ben over the past few months at the Chamber.  Ben was introduced by friends at Mesa Community College as someone who would be helpful in planning and strategizing for the Chamber.  He is very detailed oriented and has worked with me on the following:CRMOrganizational structureNew industry focused eventsBranding events and identifying sales targetsHis strategic thinking is motivating!  I'd recommend Ben to anyone looking for some outside thinking who will tell it like it is and help you to create new ways to look at and achieve bigger and better things in your business.
